name: Thyrenos

appearance.skin: Deep violet skin that shimmers like the night sky
appearance.hair: Long silver hair flowing like liquid mercury
appearance.attire: Robes made of ethereal mist and stardust, shifting in patterns of ancient runes

traits: Speaks in riddles and cryptic phrases
personality.temperament: Prefers to observe rather than intervene unless absolutely necessary

notes: role_in_council: One of the six gods on the council of Elysion, often serving as the voice of reason and contemplation.
